name: NSFileProviderTestingDeletion
desc: An operation that syncs the deletion of the source item to the target location.

items.name: var sourceItemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier
items.desc: The unique identifier for the source item.

items.name: var targetSide: NSFileProviderTestingOperationSide
items.desc: The target location for the delete operation.

items.name: var targetItemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier
items.desc: The unique identifier for the target item.

items.name: var targetItemBaseVersion: NSFileProviderItemVersion
items.desc: The version of the deleted item.

items.name: var domainVersion: NSFileProviderDomainVersion?
items.desc: The domainâ€™s version when the source location deleted the item.
